name: Drops and Dandelions
description:
Controls:
Move with WASD or Arrow Keys
R to restart
Escape or L to Quit the Game

Version 1.0 was created as  a solo project on a Sunday with the following Monday morning including some last steps. (lost Saturday to cleaning and fixing up some fallen roof tiles)
Special Thanks to D1gital Cuts for the feedback and suggestions!

Version 1.1 ChangeLog:

  1. Jump Reworked to work properly
  2. Basic Animation added to Player Seeds and Drops
  3. Health Display changed from numerical to flower
  4. Project Files sorted and cleaned.

Version 1.2 Changelog:

  1. Added Splash animation for Waterdrops and Dandelions
  2. Gameplay Demonstration now on YT

Font used by;
https://www.dafont.com/press-start.font
